verses.name: Acts 23:12
verses.text: And when it was day, certain of the Jews banded together, and bound themselves under a curse, saying that they would neither eat nor drink till they had killed Paul.

verses.name: Acts 23:13
verses.text: And they were more than forty which had made this conspiracy.

verses.name: Acts 23:14
verses.text: And they came to the chief priests and elders, and said, We have bound ourselves under a great curse, that we will eat nothing until we have slain Paul.
